mapper.sql: select soc.oss_category_id, soc.category_name, soc.parent_id, soc.order_num, soc.user_type, soc.create_by, soc.update_time, soc.create_time from sys_oss_category soc
mapper.select: select soc.oss_category_id, soc.category_name, soc.parent_id, soc.order_num, soc.user_type, soc.create_by, soc.update_time, soc.create_time, (select category_name from sys_oss_category soc1 where soc1.oss_category_id = soc.parent_id) as parent_category_name from sys_oss_category soc where oss_category_id = #{ossCategoryId}
